title: Bye, Bye Ash Ketchum - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.24.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim and Blessing talk Pokemon anime's finale, Resident Evil 4's numbers, and a big step toward Xbox acquiring Activision Blizzard.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now and it’s a one on one between Greg and Tim.
A new PSILY is also up and it’s our review of Tchia!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:45 - A trailer reveals the new, post-Ash era Pokemon anime is Pokemon Horizons
00:17:54 - Xbox's Activision Blizzard Deal Takes Major Step Forward in CMA Investigation
00:29:04 - Ad
00:30:10 - Chewy Chewy Haha
00:32:57 - Resident Evil 4 Remake Mercenaries Mode Arrives Early Next Month
00:35:58 - Resident Evil 4 Remake is the series’ biggest Steam launch to date
00:44:09 - The Lord Of The Rings: Gollum Finally Gets a Release Date
00:48:47 - Out Today
00:50:35 - “What are your gaming plans for this weekend?” - Benchjc
00:53:46 - You‘re Wrong
Monday’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
